XmlUI:
<!-- Xml UI. See documentation: https://api.tabletopsimulator.com/ui/introUI/ -->
<!--<Button onClick="uibutton" width="200" height="200">Example Button</Button>-->
<Panel id="welcome_screen" color="#FFFFFFCC" width="300" height="150">
  <VerticalLayout>
    <Text>Bienvenue au Jass entièrement scripté de TableTop Simulator.</Text>
    <Text>Choisissez une place sur la table en changeant de couleur en cliquant sur votre
    nom d'utilisateur en haut à droite. Le joueur Blanc sera maître de la salle, capable de configurer la partie.</Text>
    <Text>Asseillez vous en face de votre coéquipier Blanc-Vert ou Orange-Violet</Text>
  </VerticalLayout>
</Panel>

<Panel id="game_type_form" color="#FFFFFFCC" width="500" height="300">
  <VerticalLayout childForceExpandHeight="true" spacing="20" padding="5">
    <HorizontalLayout>
      <Text alignment="MiddleLeft">Paramètres de la partie</Text>
      <Button onClick="close_game_form">
        X
      </Button>
    </HorizontalLayout>
    <Panel>
      <HorizontalLayout>
        <Text>Nombre de points requis pour gagner:</Text>
        <Dropdown id="max_points" onValueChanged="points_selected">
          <Option id="option_500">500</Option>
          <Option id="option_1000" selected="true">1000</Option>
          <Option id="option_2500">2500</Option>
        </Dropdown>
      </HorizontalLayout>
    </Panel>
    <Button onClick="start_game">
      Lancer la partie
    </Button>
  </VerticalLayout>
</Panel>
LuaScript:
--[[ Lua code. See documentation: https://api.tabletopsimulator.com/ --]]
--[[ The onLoad event is called after the game save finishes loading. --]]
player_teams = {"Heart", "Spades"}
terminal_game_points = 1000
cards = {}

function onPlayerConnect(player)

    print("Player " .. player.steam_name .. " connected.")
end

function onPlayerChangeColor(new_player_color)
   if new_player_color == "White" then
     UI.hide("welcome_screen")
     UI.show("game_type_form")
   end
end

function close_game_form()
    UI.hide("game_type_form")
end

function points_selected(player, option, id)
    if player.color == "White" then
      terminal_game_points = tonumber(option)
    end
end

function all_players_seated()
    for _,player_color in pairs(Player.getAvailableColors()) do
      if Player[player_color].seated != true then
        return false
      end
    end
    return true
end

function start_game(player, value, id)
    -- later, check that all players are seated using the all_players_seated()
    if player.color == "White" then
        --print(all_players_seated())
        jass_deck.shuffle()
        for _,player in pairs(Player.getAvailableColors()) do
            jass_deck.deal(9, player)
        end
        close_game_form()
        -- waiting 1s otherwise the cards don't have the time to get to the
        -- player hands
        Wait.time(detect_first_player, 1)
        show_select_trump()
    end
end

function select_trump(player, value, id)
    -- use this when testing with 4 players
    --if player.steam_name == current_player.steam_name then
    --   print(id)
    --end
    if player.color == current_player.color then
        current_trump = id
        UI.hide("trump_selector")
    end
end

function show_select_trump()
    UI.setXmlTable({
      {
          tag="HorizontalLayout",
          attributes={
              height=200,
              width=500,
              color="rgba(1,1,1,0.7)",
              id="trump_selector"
          },
          children={
              {
                  tag="Button",
                  attributes={
                      text="♥",
                      fontSize=100,
                      color="red",
                      textcolor="white",
                      id="h",
                      onClick="select_trump",
                  },
              },
              {
                  tag="Button",
                  attributes={
                      text="♣",
                      fontSize=100,
                      color="black",
                      textcolor="white",
                      id="c",
                      onClick="select_trump",
                  },
              },
              {
                  tag="Button",
                  attributes={
                      text="♦",
                      fontSize=100,
                      color="red",
                      textcolor="white",
                      id="d",
                      onClick="select_trump",
                  },
              },
              {
                  tag="Button",
                  attributes={
                      text="♠",
                      fontSize=100,
                      color="black",
                      textcolor="white",
                      id="s",
                      onClick="select_trump",
                  },
              },
          }
      }
    })
end

function detect_first_player()
    for _,player_color in pairs(Player.getAvailableColors()) do
      local hand = Player[player_color].getHandObjects(1)
      for _,card in pairs(hand) do
        if card.getDescription() == "d7" then
          -- using color for testing but should switch to Player[player].steam_name
          broadcastToAll("Le premier à jouer est " .. player_color .. " car il/elle a le 7 de ♢",
                        {r=1, g=1, b=1})
          current_player=Player[player_color]
          -- implement turn system when testing with 4 players
          --Turns.enable = true
          --Turns.pass_turns = false
          --Turns.turn_color = player
        end
      end
    end
end

function compare_cards(a, b)
    return 0
end

function onLoad()
    UI.hide("game_type_form")
    jass_deck = getJassDeck()
    for _,card in pairs(jass_deck.getObjects()) do
      -- hide tooltip with card.tooltip = false
      cards[card.guid] = card.description
    end
end

function getJassDeck()
    for _,object in pairs(getAllObjects()) do
      if object.tag == 'Deck' then
          return object
        end
    end
    return nil
end

--[[ The onUpdate event is called once per frame. --]]
function onUpdate()
    --[[ print('onUpdate loop!') --]]
end
